node.display_long_description:
2MD is a groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game. Draw the plays, call the shots, and throw, hand-off, or run the ball before the clock runs out!

‣ Throw like a pro with realistic motion controls in a room-scale quarterback experience.
‣ Draw plays and hone your strategy: customize your offensive plays in VR before taking the field.
‣ Featuring 8 unique teams: Customize colors, QB voice, route color, and more.
‣ Customize your controls to fit your own throwing style!
‣ Choose from two distinct player types - robots or tackle dummies!
‣ Now featuring varied weather conditions including rain, wind, and snow!
‣ Includes 10 immersive stadiums filled with thousands of screaming fans.
‣ Featuring the voice talents of Xander Mobus, SungWon Cho and more.
‣ Exciting arcade presentation with a 7-round heat and rapid-fire bonus rounds.
‣ Spectacular replay-ability, challenging AI, achievements, leader-boards and a virtual trophy case.
‣ Now features DUMMYVISION on-field spectator cam!

nodes.title: March update:  DUMMYVISION takes the field!
nodes.body_text:
Hello again!

It hasn't even been a month since our big game overhaul, and we still have tons of updates to roll out!  So, without further ado, let's get started:

DUMMYVISION returns to 2MD!


A big part of the original game on PC platforms was the DUMMYVISION 3rd person broadcast camera, which gave player's an after-the-snap birds-eye view of the action.  Thanks to some seriously creative resource management, we've been able to squeeze it back onto the quest platform in all its glory!  Dummy League games now feature the in-game spectator display on all fields, giving you even more nail-biting moments as the ball sails toward your receivers.

Variable weather now affects on-field physics!


While DUMMYVISION is exclusive to Dummy League games, Robot League games get their own exclusive feature -- inclement weather conditions can now affect elements like ball trajectory in very subtle fashion, adding to the challenge and even providing an edge in certain circumstances!  The key here will be paying attention to the new orange windsocks atop the goalposts when variable weather is present (wind, snow, or rain).

Even more graphical improvements


While we continue to scour every corner of 2MD for feasible updates and upgrades, we're continually improving things like model optimization and texture resolution.  This newer update will include even more texture enhancements for elements with varying material properties (metal, jerseys) and on-field elements like grass and turf will pop with even more clarity.

Update board in the locker room!


We've added an update board to the locker room in place of the original leaderboard (that's been moved to just above the statboard behind you, so no more whipping your head back and forth to check stats with leaderboard metrics!).  We'll update this new noticeboard every time we push a change, so you'll quickly know what's been added to 2MD.

A league of their own!

You may have noticed at this point we're started referring to Dummy and Robot 'leagues'.  This differentiation highlights how unique each play type has become as the game continues to evolve, beyond the simple visual difference:  Dummy League is what we now consider the entry point: a level playing field, where you can hone your strategy with a consistent challenge progression from game-to-game. Robot League, meanwhile, now represents a greater challenge given the omission of an overhead display and the added variables of inclement weather which can occur with both predictable and unpredictable fashion .

We've got even more updates planned, but for now let us know how you what you think of these improvements!  Your support helps 2MD, and it really goes without saying that the best way to see the features you want to see is to spread the word and help us grow the game's audience so that we can continue to provide increasing levels of ongoing support.  Take care, and as always, thanks for playing our game!

nodes.title: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed - 2021 MASSIVE UPDATE!
nodes.body_text:
Hello!

Firstly, we'd like to welcome all new players who picked up 2MD in the last couple of weeks, along with long-time fans who've been with us since launch.  we have some exciting updates to announce, so without further ado, let's get started!



1. Major Graphical Overhaul!

First and foremost, we're excited to announce a thorough graphical overhaul of the entire game!  higher detailed player graphics (more on that below!), upgraded stadium details, textures, lighting, shadow, and more, designed to redefine the look of the game on both Quest and Quest 2.  Additionally, Quest 2 players will be treated to enhanced anisotropic filtering, AA, and higher resolution.



2. All Player Models Updated!

As mentioned above, we've gone and done a new detail pass on all player graphics.  First, we'll start with the tackle-dummies.  Dummies now feature enhanced shadow and texture detail, to allow for better visibility downfield.



Even more exciting:  robot player types have been given a substantial boost in geometric and texture detail across the board, and additionally now feature position-specific enhancements for receivers and linemen, including shoulder armor for linemen as well as a slightly more prominent size differential.  This will allow for easier differentiation between player types after the snap when precious seconds count most.  Robot players have also been given a more traditional gridiron football uniform color spread, with primary colors for their jerseys, and secondary colors for for their legs.



3. Random Weather System version 1.0!

Previewed in our last update with the Unicorns and Truants field, we've further improved weather effects for better immersion and variety in field options.  Now, the round 3 field features a newly implemented randomized version of this weather system, which can vary between dawn, dusk, rain, and snow!



4. Special Scrimmage / Play-test mode!

Players who download the 1.1 update will immediately notice a new prop on the equipment cart in the locker room, based on a vintage portable football toy:



This isn't only a nod to one of the first examples of electronic football (of which we consider 2MD a distant spiritual successor), it's also a portal into the brand-new Play Test mode.  This is an infinite scrimmage mode that will allow players not only to test their plays against a simulated team without the burden of a time-limit, it additionally includes a newly implemented real-time broadcast display, which will give players a bird's eye view of their plays before and after the snap.  We hope this will give you even more opportunity to hone and refine your strategy before chasing the championship!  Lastly of note, this field features versions for both robot and dummy player body types!



5. Practice Field Training Camp!

In addition to play-test mode, we've added additional features to the practice field to give it the feel of a pre-season training camp.  In addition to the floating target toss, the practice field now includes interactive downfield drill equipment!  New additions include tic-tac-toe boards, rebound targets, trainer nets, and a target board!  This field also includes the new broadcast display, so players can further hone throw distance and form.



6. So...Many...STATS!

We've decided to save the best for last (for some folks ;p ).   Have you ever pulled off the perfect play, resulting in a sick 80-yard touchdown, you tell your friends, but they're like:



Well, now you can, because 2MD VR: Football Unleashed version 1.1 features the addition of a new QB stat tracking feature!

Previously, we tracked simple stats such as total touchdowns, hotstreaks, and cumulative score for achievement progress.  With the 1.1 update, 2MD will begin tracking the following stats:

- Total Touchdowns
- Total Pass Touchdowns
- Total Completions
- Completion Percentage
- Total Attempts
- Total Conversions
- Total Hotstreaks
- Highest Completion Streak
- Total Passing Yards
- Total Yards
- Total Interceptions
- Total Wins
- QB Total Rush Yards
- QB Total Rush TDs

The appropriate stats will be incorporated into your Passer Rating, which will continually update as you play the game.   Additionally this will also be broken down per round!

In addition to game totals, 2MD will also collate series stats, so you can see how you did after each playthrough:

- Series Pass TDs
- Series Completions
- Series Completion Percentage
- Series Attempts
- Series Interceptions
- Series Pass Yards
- Series Rush Yards
- Series Rush TDs
- Series Total Yards
- Series Total TDs
- Series Passer Rating

All stats will be visible in the locker room, with game totals displayed on a new dedicated whiteboard situated opposite the main whiteboard.  Series stats, meanwhile, will be located on a clipboard to the right of the play designer on the main whiteboard, for easy viewing every time you return to the locker room:



For now, we will consider statistics implementation in 'beta,' as we need real-world results to ascertain how well items are being tracked.  Additionally, these new stats will reflect performance beginning at the time that the update is installed and won't be retroactive (the only lifetime totals will be the previously mentioned achievement-associated metrics, such as total wins, hotstreaks, and your cumulative score). It is our hope, however, that stats can potentially play a role in possible community events in the future, so stay tuned.

Whew!  We're hopeful that these fairly substantial updates help increase the value and replay-ability for players who are both new to the game, as well as those of you who've been with us since the beginning.  We're eternally grateful for your support, as well as your recommendations.  We only ask that, if you like 2MD, please spread the word, and of course post your review (we read all of them...Even the mean ones).  Your continued support will hopefully facilitate greater visibility for the game, which, in turn, can help support more substantial updates down the road.  Take care, and as always, thanks for taking the time to play our game!

node.reviewDescription: Wow. I honestly don’t Know what I expected when buying this but holy cow it’s so good. The only reason I’m giving this 4 stars instead of five is because I think they can add so much more to this game. This game has so much potential. This game is so cool and I love being a quarterback. ￼ when I say it can have more stuff I’m gonna list a few. Maybe start with a Season game mode where you play a full season and get all the way to the championship. Then after that maybe a different position mode like a wide receiver or running back. Then after that a career mode where you pick what position you want and you play and become a hall of fame player. This game has so much potential. Please don’t stop. I would pay 15 more bucks for an add on of all the things I mentioned. So you can definitely make more money. Great game. Keep it up

website_page_meta.description:
2MD is a groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game. Draw the plays, call the shots, and throw, hand-off, or run the ball before the clock runs out!

‣ Throw like a pro with realistic motion controls in a room-scale quarterback experience.
‣ Draw up to 8 offensive plays in VR before taking the field.
‣ 8 customizable teams and 8 immersive stadiums.
‣ Exciting arcade presentation, challenging AI, achievements, leaderboards, virtual trophy case, and more.
‣ Oculus Rift Cross-Buy Enabled.
